General.Name: Thaicom Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thaicom Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides transponder services for domestic and international communications. The company operates through Satellite Business Services, Internet and Media Services, and Telephone Network segments. It also offers broadband content services, internet data center services, internet services, satellite uplink-downlink services, technical support in relation satellite business, broadcasting television service, telecommunication, telephone network services, mobile contents, and engineering and development services on communication technology and electronics. In addition, the company sells user terminal iPSTAR, direct television equipment, and satellite equipment; and distributes unmanned aerial vehicles for agricultural sector. Further, it offers system integration consultancy service for broadband network and broadband content services; fixed line, mobile phone, public phone, and public international facility services; and digital money payment and transfer services. The company has operations in Thailand, Australia, India, Japan, Myanmar, Malaysia, Singapore, and internationally. Thaicom Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Chatuchak, Thailand.
